comments:
I've a remote folder, accessed through RSE (Remote System Explorer, a component in Eclipse TM project). Explorer view shows all files and directories. When I doubleclick a file for opening it, i get the following exception (same error is got whatever file type or folder is):

have we fixed this bug, with wtp 2.0.1?
upgrading to wtp 2.0.1 will solve it
installing WTP 2.0.1 seem to fix the problem also use latest RSE
